name: whois-xml-api
label: WhoisXMLAPI
description: WhoisXMLAPI Provides comprehensive set of real-time and historic Whois, Domain name and DNS Data

fields.name: api_key
fields.title: API Key
fields.description: Specify the API key configured for your account using the WhoisXMLAPI

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True

operations.title: Get WHOIS History Search
operations.description: Retrieves complete WHOIS change history including change in domain ownership, registrar information as per domain name, created date, updated date based on the domain name and filter criteria that you have specified

parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.name: domainName
parameters.description: Specify the domain name for which historic WHOIS data is requested
parameters.tooltip: Specify the domain name for which historic WHOIS data is requested.

parameters.title: Since Date
parameters.name: sinceDate
parameters.description: Specify a date to search through domains and list the activities discovered after the given date. Acceptable date format is YYYY-MM-DD
parameters.tooltip: Specify a date to search through domains and list the activities discovered after the given date. Acceptable date format is YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.title: Created Date From
parameters.name: createdDateFrom
parameters.description: Specify a date to search through domains created after the specified date and list the activities discovered. Acceptable date format is YYYY-MM-DD
parameters.tooltip: Specify a date to search through domains created after the specified date and list the activities discovered. Acceptable date format is YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.title: Created Date To
parameters.name: createdDateTo
parameters.description: Specify a date to search through domains created before the specified date and list the activities discovered. Acceptable date format is YYYY-MM-DD
parameters.tooltip: Specify a date to search through domains created before the specified date and list the activities discovered. Acceptable date format is YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.title: Updated Date From
parameters.name: updatedDateFrom
parameters.description: Specify a date to search through domains updated after the specified date and list the activities discovered. Acceptable date format is YYYY-MM-DD
parameters.tooltip: Specify a date to search through domains updated after the specified date and list the activities discovered. Acceptable date format is YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.title: Updated Date To
parameters.name: updatedDateTo
parameters.description: Specify a date to search through domains updated before the specified date and list the activities discovered. Acceptable date format is YYYY-MM-DD
parameters.tooltip: Specify a date to search through domains updated before the specified date and list the activities discovered. Acceptable date format is YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.title: Expired Date From
parameters.name: expiredDateFrom
parameters.description: Specify a date to search through domains expired after the specified date and list the activities discovered. Acceptable date format is YYYY-MM-DD.
parameters.tooltip: Specify a date to search through domains expired after the specified date and list the activities discovered. Acceptable date format is YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.title: Expired Date To
parameters.name: expiredDateTo
parameters.description: Specify a date to search through domains expired after the specified date and list the activities discovered. Acceptable date format is YYYY-MM-DD
parameters.tooltip: Specify a date to search through domains expired after the specified date and list the activities discovered. Acceptable date format is YYYY-MM-DD

operations.title: Get WHOIS Search
operations.description: Retrieves the registration details, also known as the WHOIS record data, of a domain name, IP address, or email address that you have specified

parameters.title: Domain/IPv4/IPv6/Email Address
parameters.name: domainName
parameters.description: Specify the domain name, IPv4, IPv6, or email address for which WHOIS data is requested
parameters.tooltip: Specify the domain name, IPv4, IPv6, or email address for which WHOIS data is requested

parameters.title: Prefer Fresh
parameters.name: preferFresh
parameters.description: Select this option to get the latest WHOIS records even if it's incomplete
parameters.tooltip: Select this option to get the latest WHOIS records even if it's incomplete

parameters.title: Domain Availability
parameters.name: da
parameters.description: Select to perform a check on domain availability. You can choose from following options, 0 - No Check: Select this option to skip checking domain availability, 1- Quick Check: Select this option to perform a quick check on domain availability, 2 -Thorough Check: Select this option to perform a slower but more accurate check on domain availability
parameters.tooltip: Select to perform a check on domain availability. You can choose from following options, 0 - No Check: Select this option to skip checking domain availability, 1- Quick Check: Select this option to perform a quick check on domain availability, 2 -Thorough Check: Select this option to perform a slower but more accurate check on domain availability

parameters.title: IP Address
parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: Select this option to return IP addresses for the specified domain name
parameters.tooltip: Select this option to return IP addresses for the specified domain name

parameters.title: IP Address Whois
parameters.name: ipWhois
parameters.description: Select this option to return the WHOIS record of the hosting IP address
parameters.tooltip: Select this option to return the WHOIS record of the hosting IP address

parameters.title: Proxy Data
parameters.name: checkProxyData
parameters.description: Select this option to fetch proxy or WHOIS guard data
parameters.tooltip: Select this option to fetch proxy or WHOIS guard data

parameters.title: Other Fields
parameters.tooltip: Specify fields in the JSON format to use as filter criteria for WHOIS Search
parameters.description: Specify fields in the JSON format to use as filter criteria for WHOIS Search
parameters.name: other_fields

operations.title: Get Reverse WHOIS Search
operations.description: Retrieves all domains containing registrant's name, email address, or phone number that you have specified as a search criteria

parameters.title: Include Domain Search Terms
parameters.name: include_domain_search_terms
parameters.description: Specify comma-separated terms to search and retrieve domain names containing the specified search terms in their Whois data. It retrieves only those domains that contain all the specified terms. Maximum four search terms are supported and is case-insensitive
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma-separated terms to search and retrieve domain names containing the specified search terms in their Whois data. It retrieves only those domains that contain all the specified terms. Maximum four search terms are supported and is case-insensitive

parameters.title: Exclude Domain Search Terms
parameters.name: exclude_domain_search_terms
parameters.description: Specify comma-separated terms to search and retrieve domain names that do not contain the specified search terms in their Whois data. It retrieves only those domains that do not contain any of the specified terms. Maximum four search terms are supported and is case-insensitive
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma-separated terms to search and retrieve domain names that do not contain the specified search terms in their Whois data. It retrieves only those domains that do not contain any of the specified terms. Maximum four search terms are supported and is case-insensitive

parameters.title: Include Audit Dates
parameters.name: include_audit_dates
parameters.description: Select to supplement each domain name in the output with the corresponding audit dates
parameters.tooltip: Select to supplement each domain name in the output with the corresponding audit dates

parameters.title: Search Type
parameters.name: search_type
parameters.description: Select a search type from following options, Current: Select this option to search only in the current WHOIS records, Historic: Select this option to search in both actual and historical WHOIS records
parameters.tooltip: Select a search type from following options, Current: Select this option to search only in the current WHOIS records, Historic: Select this option to search in both actual and historical WHOIS records

parameters.title: Mode
parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: Select a mode to list the domains: Select a mode to list the domains, Preview: Select this option to return only the count of domains without deduction of credits, Purchase: Select this option to return the actual list of domains (max 10,000) costing 10 DRS credits
parameters.tooltip: Select a mode to list the domains: Select a mode to list the domains, Preview: Select this option to return only the count of domains without deduction of credits, Purchase: Select this option to return the actual list of domains (max 10,000) costing 10 DRS credits

parameters.title: Created Date From
parameters.name: createdDateFrom
parameters.description: Specify a date to search through domains created after the specified date. Acceptable date format is YYYY-MM-DD
parameters.tooltip: Specify a date to search through domains created after the specified date. Acceptable date format is YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.title: Created Date To
parameters.name: createdDateTo
parameters.description: Specify a date to search through domains created before the specified date. Acceptable date format is YYYY-MM-DD
parameters.tooltip: Specify a date to search through domains created before the specified date. Acceptable date format is YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.title: Updated Date From
parameters.name: updatedDateFrom
parameters.description: Specify a date to search through domains updated after the specified date. Acceptable date format is YYYY-MM-DD
parameters.tooltip: Specify a date to search through domains updated after the specified date. Acceptable date format is YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.title: Updated Date To
parameters.name: updatedDateTo
parameters.description: Specify a date to search through domains updated before the specified date. Acceptable date format is YYYY-MM-DD
parameters.tooltip: Specify a date to search through domains updated before the specified date. Acceptable date format is YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.title: Expired Date From
parameters.name: expiredDateFrom
parameters.description: Specify a date to search through domains expired after the specified date. Acceptable date format is YYYY-MM-DD
parameters.tooltip: Specify a date to search through domains expired after the specified date. Acceptable date format is YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.title: Expired Date To
parameters.name: expiredDateTo
parameters.description: Specify a date to search through domains expired before the specified date. Acceptable date format is YYYY-MM-DD
parameters.tooltip: Specify a date to search through domains expired before the specified date. Acceptable date format is YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.title: Search After
parameters.name: search_after
parameters.description: Specify a value to retrieve the next page of the listed 10,000 records. The value to specify is present in the nextPageSearchAfter field in the output. The results are sorted in descending order as they appear in the WhoisXML database
parameters.tooltip: Specify a value to retrieve the next page of the listed 10,000 records. The value to specify is present in the nextPageSearchAfter field in the output. The results are sorted in descending order as they appear in the WhoisXML database

operations.title: Get DNS Lookup
operations.description: Retrieves DNS Lookup from WhoisXML's API based on the domain name that you have specified. A DNS lookup provides a domain's corresponding IP address from its A, MX, NS, TXT, and other records

parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.name: domainName
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the domain to retrieve its DNS Lookup information from WhoisXML API
parameters.description: Specify the name of the domain to retrieve its DNS Lookup information from WhoisXML API

parameters.title: DNS Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.tooltip: Select the multiple DNS types to for the specified Domain name. All DNS records can be retrieved with DNS Type=_all
parameters.description: Select the lookup type based on which to retrieve records from WhoisXML API

operations.title: Get Reverse DNS Search
operations.description: Retrieves the list of domains that have resolved to the IP address, mail server, or name server that you have specified

parameters.title: DNS Type
parameters.name: reverse_dns_type

IPv4 Address.title: IPv4 Address
IPv4 Address.name: ip
IPv4 Address.tooltip: Specify an IP address to retrieve a list of domains that have resolved to the given IP address on the Domain Name System (DNS)
IPv4 Address.description: Specify an IP address to retrieve a list of domains that have resolved to the given IP address on the Domain Name System (DNS)

Mail Server.title: Mail Server
Mail Server.name: mx
Mail Server.tooltip: Specify the mail server to retrieve a list of domains that have resolved to the given mail server on the Domain Name System (DNS)
Mail Server.description: Specify the mail server to retrieve a list of domains that have resolved to the given mail server on the Domain Name System (DNS)

Name Server.title: Name Server
Name Server.name: ns
Name Server.tooltip: Specify the name server to retrieve a list of domains that have resolved to the given name server on the Domain Name System (DNS)
Name Server.description: Specify the name server to retrieve a list of domains that have resolved to the given name server on the Domain Name System (DNS)

parameters.tooltip: Select the DNS type, to retrieve reverse DNS information, from the following options
parameters.description: Select the DNS type, to retrieve reverse DNS information, from the following options

parameters.title: From
parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Specify the domain name to use as an offset for the results returned. Each response is limited to 300 records and the subsequent pages can be retrieved by putting the last domain name from the response into this parameter. If the parameter is omitted, 300 arbitrary records are returned. To get the first page, specify 1 in this parameter
parameters.tooltip: Specify the domain name to use as an offset for the results returned. Each response is limited to 300 records and the subsequent pages can be retrieved by putting the last domain name from the response into this parameter. If the parameter is omitted, 300 arbitrary records are returned. To get the first page, specify 1 in this parameter

operations.title: Domain or Subdomain Discovery
operations.description: Retrieves the list of domains and subdomains associated with the search terms that you have specified

parameters.title: Include Domain
parameters.name: include_domain
parameters.description: Specify a comma-separated list of domains to search its domains and subdomains
parameters.tooltip: Specify a comma-separated list of domains to search its domains and subdomains

parameters.title: Include Subdomain
parameters.name: include_subdomain
parameters.description: Specify a comma-separated list of subdomains to search its domains and subdomains
parameters.tooltip: Specify a comma-separated list of subdomains to search its domains and subdomains

parameters.title: Exclude Domains
parameters.name: exclude_domains
parameters.description: Specify the comma-separated list of domains to exclude its domains and subdomains from the search
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma-separated list of domains to exclude its domains and subdomains from the search

parameters.title: Exclude Subdomains
parameters.name: exclude_subdomains
parameters.description: Specify the comma-separated list of subdomains to exclude its domains and subdomains from the search
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma-separated list of subdomains to exclude its domains and subdomains from the search

parameters.title: Since Date
parameters.name: sinceDate
parameters.description: Select a date to search through domains or subdomains discovered since the specified date
parameters.tooltip: Select a date to search through domains or subdomains discovered since the specified date

operations.title: Brand Monitor
operations.description: Searches across all recently registered and deleted domain names and retrieves the ones containing the search term that you have specified

parameters.title: Include Domain Search Terms
parameters.name: include_domain_search_terms
parameters.description: Specify comma-separated terms to search and retrieve domain names containing the specified trademarked words or phrases. It retrieves only those domains that closely match all the specified terms. Maximum four search terms are supported and is case-insensitive
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma-separated terms to search and retrieve domain names containing the specified trademarked words or phrases. It retrieves only those domains that closely match all the specified terms. Maximum four search terms are supported and is case-insensitive

parameters.title: Exclude Domain Search Terms
parameters.name: exclude_domain_search_terms
parameters.description: Specify comma-separated terms to search and retrieve domain names that do not contain the specified trademarked words or phrases. It retrieves only those domains that do not match with any of the specified terms. Maximum four search terms are supported and is case-insensitive
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma-separated terms to search and retrieve domain names that do not contain the specified trademarked words or phrases. It retrieves only those domains that do not match with any of the specified terms. Maximum four search terms are supported and is case-insensitive

parameters.title: Since Date
parameters.name: sinceDate
parameters.description: Select a date within the last 14 days to search through activities since the specified date. By default, it considers yesterday's date. NOTE: There may be some latency between the actual added, renewal, or expired date and the date when WhoisXML detected this change. Hence, use this field in your monitoring tools for filtering daily changes
parameters.tooltip: Select a date within the last 14 days to search through activities since the specified date. By default, it considers yesterday's date. NOTE: There may be some latency between the actual added, renewal, or expired date and the date when WhoisXML detected this change. Hence, use this field in your monitoring tools for filtering daily changes

parameters.title: Mode
parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: Select a mode to list the domains: Preview: Select this option to return only the count of domains without deduction of credits. Purchase: Select this option to return the actual list of domains (max 10,000) costing 10 DRS credits
parameters.tooltip: Select a mode to list the domains: Preview: Select this option to return only the count of domains without deduction of credits. Purchase: Select this option to return the actual list of domains (max 10,000) costing 10 DRS credits

parameters.title: With Typos
parameters.name: withTypos
parameters.description: Select to include with the search terms their possible typos. For example, the typos for google might be: goigle, gokgle, golgle, gopgle, goglee, or gooogle
parameters.tooltip: Select to include with the search terms their possible typos. For example, the typos for google might be: goigle, gokgle, golgle, gopgle, goglee, or gooogle

operations.title: Get SSL Certificates
operations.description: Retrieves the complete SSL certification chain to reveal potential inconsistencies and misconfigurations based one the domain name that you have specified

parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.name: domainName
parameters.description: Specify the domain name to request its SSl certificates
parameters.tooltip: Specify the domain name to request its SSl certificates

parameters.title: With Chain
parameters.name: withChain
parameters.description: Select to get the entire chain of domain certificates, sorted from the end user to the root user
parameters.tooltip: Select to get the entire chain of domain certificates, sorted from the end user to the root user

parameters.title: Hard Refresh
parameters.name: hardRefresh
parameters.description: Select to get fresh data
parameters.tooltip: Select to get fresh data
